titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on ACRYPET UT100.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 11/16/2004--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2007, the duty on Methyl methacrylate polymer with N-cyclohexylmaleimide, styrene, and alpha-methylstyrene (ACRYPET UT100).
